data.text:
In Albert Brooks

…in Defending Your Life (1991); Mother (1996), which starred Debbie Reynolds in the title role; The Muse (1999); and Looking for Comedy in the Muslim World (2005). He also appeared in the crime dramas Drive (2011) and A Most Violent Year (2014) and portrayed a doctor in Concussion (2015), about…

Read More

In Debbie Reynolds

…notably in Albert Brooks’s film Mother (1996); in episodes (1999–2006) of the TV series Will & Grace, as the latter title character’s flamboyant mother; and in the movie Behind the Candelabra (2013), as the mother of the entertainer Liberace. In 2001 she costarred with Shirley MacLaine, Joan Collins, and Elizabeth…
